Package geometries

Class Tube

java.lang.Object
geometries.Intersectable
geometries.Geometry
geometries.RadialGeometry
geometries.Tube
Direct Known Subclasses:
Cylinder
public class Tube
extends RadialGeometry
Class that represent infinite cylinder in 3D Cartesian coordinate system by radius ang ray

    • findIntersections

      protected java.util.List<Intersectable.GeoPoint> findIntersections​(Ray ray, double max)
      Function for finding intersections points with an infinite tube.
      Parameters:
      ray - The ray that we check if it intersects the tube.
      max - the maximum range from the source of the ray to the point
      Returns:
      a list of intersection points, if any.
